column4: There is one particular application that looks bad under my current GNOME theme. I'd like to make that application, and no other, use a different theme. How?
what program, and in what way do you want it to look different?
it's a Java app called GURPS Character sheet. Normally I use a dark background and light text, but this app uses custom colors. Only it fails to override my colors in some instances. Lame, I know.
I'm not finding anything at this point...still looking
